footer.title: Read, study, and learn The Noble Quran.

no-bookmarks: You do not have any bookmarks yet

welcome.body: After over a year of hard work we are excited to present to you the new Quran.com. We have put great effort to provide you with new experiences such as sepia mode, word-by-word view, command bar, IndoPak Mushafs, and more. <2/><2/> We hope you enjoy the new Quran.com as much as we do. Please let us know about bugs and feature requests on <0>feedback.quran.com</0>. We are all in this together and want to improve the product to serve you better. <2/><2/> If you wish to go back to the old site at any time, please visit <1>previous.quran.com</1>. <2/><2/>- Quran.com team
welcome.title: Welcome to the new Quran.com!
